original_text: But you know what Timothy is like. He has worked with me like a son works to help his father. Together we have taught people God's good news.
korean_text: 디모데의 연단을 너희가 아나니 자식이 아버지에게 함같이 나와 함께 복음을 위하여 수고하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But you know what Timothy is like
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여러분은 디모데가 어떤 사람인지 압니다

sentences.original_text: like a son works to help his father
